caseTitle: Kanwar Arif Ali Khan v. Danis Ali
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: A person who is not a party to a suit or a proceeding in the court below should file a separate application for obtaining leave from the appellate court to appeal the judgment, decree or order of which he feels aggrieved, along with the memorandum of appeal filed by him.
